stmt.origin: 3eqtrri(cabs, cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cfv(c2nd, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)))

body.origin:

-| wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)), cabs)
body.pretty:
⊢ abs =(normCV ` c0)
⊣ (normCV ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)
⊣ (2nd ` c0)=(2nd ` < < +, × >, abs >)
⊣ (2nd ` < < +, × >, abs >)= abs

stmt.pretty: mp2an(abs ∈ 𝕌, (abs : ℂ → ℝ), ℂ ∈ 𝕌)
